abstract: British couple Kate and Gerry McCann win about $549,000 in libel suit against Portuguese detective Goncalo Amaral, who published book linking them to 2007 disappearance of their four-year-old daughter Madeline.
lead_paragraph: The parents of a missing British girl, Madeleine McCann, have won about $549,000 in a libel suit against a former Portuguese detective.

headline.main: Portugal: Missing Girl’s Parents Win Libel Suit Linked to Case
headline.print_headline: Europe; Portugal: Missing Girl’s Parents Win Libel Suit Linked to Case

snippet: The parents of a missing British girl, Madeleine McCann, have won about $549,000 in a libel suit against a former Portuguese detective.
